meanings.definition: The quality of being in accordance with current trends or styles.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit's fashionableness caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The fashionableness of his new shoes made him feel confident.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at fashionableness with a bow tie was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The fashionableness of the city's architecture was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The fashionableness of the dress was so striking that it stayed in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: The state of being stylish or trendy.
meanings.sent1: She always keeps up with the latest fashionableness in magazines.
meanings.sent2: His fashionableness is evident in the way he carries himself.
meanings.sent3: The dog's attempt at fashionableness with sunglasses was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The fashionableness of her jewelry collection was like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The fashionableness of his haircut was so cool that many people copied it.
